definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Three are under berets have lightning insignia emblem.
sentences.chinese: 三是贝雷帽的警徽下有闪电徽号。

definition: honorific title/form of address reserved for a queen, ancestor, emperor etc
temple name of a deceased Chinese emperor
reign title/era name (name for either the entire reign of an emperor or one part of it)/year number (such as 2016 or 甲子)
official name of a nation (includes dynastic names of China: 漢|汉[Han4], 唐[Tang2] etc)
to change an emperor's or ruler's reign title (old)
to award (a prize)/to confer on sb/to confer upon by authority
posthumous name or title/to confer a posthumous title
to confer a title upon sb/to dub/to crown/to invest with rank or title
to succeed to a title/to inherit
